interestingcomments.content:
Top Futurology News - For the week of Feb 21, 2020 /!/ **We hope you enjoy this week's update!**

Here are the top stories from this past week:

1. [Breakthrough Bendable Supercapacitor Made From Graphene Charges Quickly and Stores Record-high Level of Energy](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/news/2020/feb/fast-charging-long-running-bendy-energy-storage-breakthrough)

*A new bendable supercapacitor made from graphene, which charges quickly and safely stores a record-high level of energy for use over a long period, has been developed and demonstrated by UCL and Chinese Academy of Sciences researchers.*

2. [The Manchester Theory - A Discussion on Artificial Super Intelligence (ASI)](https://futuristech.info/posts/the-manchester-theory-a-discussion-on-artificial-super-intelligence-asi)

*A humanity without at least basic technical equipment is therefore almost unimaginable and the probability of mechanization increases proportionally with the self-confidence and intelligence of a species.*

3. [Scientists Create Artificial Genome That Can Reproduce](https://futurism.com/the-byte/scientists-create-artificial-genome-reproduce)

*German scientists* [*say that*](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-reproductive-genome-laboratory.html) *for the first time ever, they’ve created a lab-grown artificial genome that can reproduce itself like a natural one.* 

4. [New green technology generates electricity 'out of thin air'](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-green-technology-electricity-thin-air.html)

*Scientists at the University of Massachusetts Amherst have developed a device that uses a natural protein to create electricity from moisture in the air, a new technology they say could have significant implications for the future of renewable energy, climate change and in the future of medicine.*

Links to all original sources below the super long image showcasing this weeks' stories.

![img](7nmzylixugi41)

And here are the rest of the stories (also important, but not the top stories):

* [A very different, very clean energy source: thin air](https://bigthink.com/technology-innovation/air-gen)
* [Woman with ‘mutant’ gene who feels no pain and heals without scarring discovered by scientists](https://www.independent.co.uk/news/health/healing-powers-no-pain-mutant-gene-scotland-a8842836.html?utm_source=reddit.com)
* [3D Printing of Body Parts Is Coming Fast—but Regulations Are Not Ready](https://singularityhub.com/2020/02/21/3d-printing-of-body-parts-is-coming-fast-but-regulations-are-not-ready/)
* [These Tiny, Solar-Powered Wings Flap Faster Than a Butterfly’s](https://futurism.com/tiny-solar-powered-wings-faster-buttefly)
* [GOLDMAN warns of stock market correction...](https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/20/investing/goldman-sachs-stocks/index.html)
* ["EpiPen" for spinal cord injuries use nanoparticles which can potentially prevent paralysis](https://www.uq.edu.au/news/filething/get-styled/large/217444/AIBN_Image%20of%20dots%20smaller.jpg)
* [Flexible, see-through, and printable quantum dot solar cells achieve new breakthrough](https://www.uq.edu.au/news/article/2020/02/solar-technology-breakthrough-uq)
* [Breakthrough Bendable Supercapacitor Made From Graphene Charges Quickly and Stores Record-high Level of Energy](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/news/2020/feb/fast-charging-long-running-bendy-energy-storage-breakthrough)
* [World’s First Modular Electric Utility Vehicle – T-ONE by Neuron EV](https://www.intelligentliving.co/modular-electric-utility-t-one/)
* ['By any means necessary': Vice President Pence urges NASA on moon-Mars goal](https://www.space.com/vp-pence-pushes-nasa-moon-mars-goal.html)
* [Manned Racing Drone](https://theawesomer.com/manned-racing-drone/561051/)
* [HTC's Project Proton is a preview of its next-gen VR headsets](https://www.engadget.com/2020/02/20/htc-project-proton-next-gen-vr-headset/)
* [Physicists grab individual atoms in groundbreaking experiment](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-physicists-individual-atoms-groundbreaking.html)
* [Watch a Violinist Play While Surgeons Operate on Her Brain](https://futurism.com/watch-play-violin-during-brain-surgery)
* [Ring Updates Device Security and Privacy—But Ignores Larger Concerns](https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2020/02/ring-updates-device-security-and-privacy-ignores-larger-concerns)
* [When It Comes to Investing in Real Estate, It’s Time to Stop Living in the Past](https://futurism.com/investing-in-real-estate-fundrise)
* [The Manchester Theory - A Discussion on Artificial Super Intelligence (ASI)](https://futuristech.info/posts/the-manchester-theory-a-discussion-on-artificial-super-intelligence-asi)
* [SpaceX will fly space tourists on Crew Dragon for Space Adventures](https://www.space.com/spacex-crew-dragon-will-fly-space-tourists.html)
* [MIT’s Ground-Penetrating Radar Looks Down for Perfect Self-Driving](https://www.extremetech.com/extreme/306205-mit-wavesense-ground-penetrating-radar-self-driving)
* [Zero Gravity partners with NASA to provide weightless flights for science](https://www.space.com/zero-gravity-corp-nasa-weightless-research-flights.html)
* [Want to Be Taller? Radical Surgery Permanently Extends Your Legs.](https://futurism.com/radical-surgery-taller-leg-lengthening)
* [Airbus’ Maveric Brings B-2 Bomber Style to Passenger Jets](https://www.wired.com/story/airbus-maveric-blended-wing-jet/)
* [Scientists Create Artificial Genome That Can Reproduce](https://futurism.com/scientists-create-artificial-genome-reproduce)
* [Saturn's weird, Earth-like moon just failed a key test for alien life](https://www.livescience.com/titan-is-lifeless-due-to-quantum-mechanics.html)
* [New adventures in beds and baths for spaceflight](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-adventures-beds-spaceflight.html)
* [China destroys $600 million in cash to stop spread...](https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/world-news/china-destroys-600-million-cash-21520944)
* [Scientists Jump-Started Consciousness in Monkeys by Pinpointing This Brain Region](https://singularityhub.com/2020/02/18/scientists-jump-started-consciousness-in-monkeys-by-pinpointing-this-brain-region/)
* [SpaceX launches 60 Starlink satellites for new megaconstellation, misses rocket landing](https://www.space.com/spacex-starlink-4-launch-success-misses-rocket-landing.html)
* [Rattlesnake venom compound points to promising new painkiller](https://newatlas.com/medical/rattlesnake-venom-crotoxin-silica-painkiller/)
* [New green technology generates electricity 'out of thin air'](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-green-technology-electricity-thin-air.html)
* [Breakthrough Listen releases 2 petabytes of data from SETI survey of Milky Way](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-breakthrough-petabytes-seti-survey-milky.html)
* [20 Stocks to Buy From the Law of Accelerating Returns](https://investorplace.com/stocks-to-buy-the-law-of-accelerating-returns/)
* [Emotion AI researchers say overblown claims give their work a bad name](https://www.technologyreview.com/s/615232/ai-emotion-recognition-affective-computing-hirevue-regulation-ethics/)
* [This bacon looks like the real thing as it sizzles—but it’s made from fungus](https://www.fastcompany.com/90463994/this-bacon-looks-like-the-real-thing-as-it-sizzles-but-its-made-from-fungus)
* [New technology for pathogen detection driven by lasers](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-technology-pathogen-driven-lasers.html)
* [Weird Old Predictions](https://theawesomer.com/weird-old-predictions/559566/)
* [Human Missions to Mars Will Use Lasers to Communicate With Earth](https://www.inverse.com/science/human-missions-to-mars-will-use-lasers-to-communicate-with-earth-nasa)
* [DNA racers burn up the track in molecular Grand Prix - ‘Origami’ nanomotors attain a blistering pace of 100 nanometres per minute.](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-020-00394-w)
* [Biomedical Engineer Creates “Smart” Bandages to Heal Chronic Wounds](https://today.uconn.edu/2020/02/uconn-biomedical-engineer-creates-smart-bandages-heal-chronic-wounds/)
* [Researchers find a way to 3D print whole objects in seconds](https://www.engadget.com/2020/02/13/3d-print-whole-objects-seconds-resin/)
* [Low-Power AI Startup Eta Compute Delivers First Commercial Chips](https://spectrum.ieee.org/tech-talk/semiconductors/processors/lowpower-ai-startup-eta-compute-delivers-first-commercial-chips)
* [Study uncovers new electronic state of matter](https://phys.org/news/2020-02-uncovers-electronic-state.html)
* [Automated system can rewrite outdated sentences in Wikipedia articles](http://news.mit.edu/2020/automated-rewrite-wikipedia-articles-0212)
* [Watch Israel's new laser weapon shoot drones out of sky...](https://nypost.com/2020/02/12/watch-israels-wild-new-laser-weapon-shoot-drones-out-of-sky/)
* [Quantum entanglement over 30 miles of fiber has brought super secure internet closer](https://www.technologyreview.com/s/615191/quantum-entanglement-over-30-miles-of-fiber-has-brought-super-secure-internet-closer/)
* [Lab-made cells outdo animal testing for cancer research](https://www.futurity.org/electrospun-synthetic-cell-scaffolds-animal-testing-cancer-research-2278972-2/)
* [World’s Largest Firework](https://theawesomer.com/worlds-largest-firework/560320/)
* [Here’s What the Future of Advertising Will Look Like (Spoiler—It’s a Little Creepy)](https://singularityhub.com/2020/02/12/heres-what-the-future-of-advertising-will-look-like-spoiler-its-a-little-creepy/)
* [Citizenship Is the Hot Commodity of the 21st Century](https://nomadcapitalist.com/2020/02/12/citizenship-hot-commodity-21st-century/)
* [Mathematicians Are Studying Planet-Sized Quantum Computers With God-Like Powers](https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/xgqg9a/mathematicians-are-studying-planet-sized-quantum-computers-with-god-like-powers)
